articles.description: Premier League's Friday news conferences and team news as under-pressure managers Julen Lopetegui and Ange Postecoglou face the media.

articles.description: Harry Brook's 123 on the opening day in Wellington, following his 171 in Christchurch, has the tourists in reach of a series win.
articles.title: New Zealand v England: Harry Brook's 'favourite' century sets up chance at series win

articles.description: Andrew Benson digs into the ongoing row between F1 world champion Max Verstappen and rival George Russell.
articles.title: Max Verstappen v George Russell - what's going on?

articles.description: Ferrari's Charles Leclerc is fastest in first practice but is given a 10-place grid penalty for the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix.
articles.title: Abu Dhabi Grand Prix: Charles Leclerc fastest in first practice but has 10-place grid penalty

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur boss Ange Postecoglou says he is not interested in whether fans back him after he was confronted by supporters.
articles.title: Spurs boss Ange Postecoglou has 'no interest' whether fans are backing him

articles.description: Mitchell Starc claims career-best Test figures of 6-48 as Australia seize the initiative on day one of the second Test against India.
articles.title: Australia vs India: Mitchell Starc's 6-48 and Nathan McSweeney's unbeaten 38 give hosts upper hand on day one of second Test at Adelaide Oval

articles.description: Arsenal are on a run of four consecutive victories and are seven points behind Premier League leaders Liverpool.
articles.title: Mikel Arteta: Arsenal boss wants Gunners to be 'kings at everything'

articles.description: Ilona Maher is a social media phenomenon and the Bristol Bears new signing says rugby needs to learn the secrets behind her numbers.
articles.title: Ilona Maher: Bristol Bears move and TikTok viral hit

articles.description: He has been compared to Ronaldinho... Mina Rzouki explains why Manchester United must unlock Joshua Zirkzee's talent.
articles.title: Why Ruben Amorim must unlock Joshua Zirkzee's talent

articles.description: Mohamed Salah is a no brainer as captain this week, writes Thomas Woods, and he is joined by two Liverpool team-mates in the FPL team of the week.
articles.title: FPL tips and team of week 15 - Mohamed Salah captain and go big on Liverpool and Villa
